Test Steps:
1- Open Postman
2- Set Method = POST
3- Endpoint = /api/v1/products
4- Body = valid JSON (title, price, description, categoryId, images)
5 Click Send
Expected result:
Status Code = 201 Created
Response JSON contains id, title, price, description, category, images, creationAt, updatedAt

Test Steps:
1-Open Postman.
2-Set method to POST.
3-Enter URL: {{API_URL}}/api/v1/products.
4-Go to Body → raw → JSON.
5-Write valid categoryId: "categoryId": 44.
6-Click Send.
Expected result:
"statusCode": 201 Created 
 product created

Test Steps:
1-Set "categoryId": null.
2-Send the request.
Expected result:
"statusCode": 400
 "error": "Bad Request",
"message": [
    "categoryId should not be empty",
     "categoryId must be a number conforming to the specified constraints"
    ]

Test Steps:
1-Use "categoryId": "44".
categoryId as string number
2-Send request.
Expected result: 400 Bad Request
Actual result:
"statusCode":201 Created
A new resource was created successfull

Test Steps:
1-Use "categoryId": "abc".
ategoryId as non-numeric string
2-Send reques
Expected result:
"statusCode": 400
"error": "Bad Request",
"message": [
        "categoryId must be a number conforming to the specified constraints"
    ]

categoryId using Arabic number
2-Send the request.
